---
title: "BMI Calculator"
output:
  html_document: default
  pdf_document: default
---


```{r}
if(! require("shiny")) {install.packages("shiny")} + library(shiny)
ui<- fluidPage(
  titlePanel("BMI Calculator"),
    sidebarLayout(
      sidebarPanel(
        numericInput("wt","Enter your weight in KG:",0, min = 60, max = 80, step = 1),
        numericInput("ht","Enter your height in meter:",0, min = 100, max = 300, step = 5)
      ),
      mainPanel(
        sidebarPanel(
        h1("BMI Result"),
        h4("Your BMI:"),
        textOutput("BMI"),
        h4("Your Height"),
        textOutput("Hight"),
        h4("Your Weight"),
        textOutput("weight"),
        h4("Your Result"),
        textOutput("predict"),
        width = 8
        )
    )
  )
)

BMI = function(height,weight){
  return((weight/(height)^2)*10000)
}

server<-shinyServer(function(input,output){
  output$BMI<- renderPrint({BMI(input$ht, input$wt)})
  output$weight<- renderPrint({input$wt})
  output$hight<- renderPrint({input$ht})
  
  x<-reactive({BMI(input$ht, input$wt)})

  output$predict<-renderPrint({
    if (x()<16) {
      "Severe Thinness"
    } else if(16<x() & x()<17) {
      "Moderate Thinness"
    } else if(17<x() & x()<18.5) {
      "Mild Thinness"
    } else if(18.5<x() & x()<25) {
      "Normal"
    } else if(25<x() & x()<30) {
      "Overweight"
    } else if(30<x() & x()<35) {
      "Obese Class I"
    } else if(35<x() & x()<40) {
      "Obese Class II"
    } else if(x()>40) {
      "Obese Class III"
    }
  })
  }
)

shinyApp(ui= ui ,server = server)

# Severe Thinness	< 16
# Moderate Thinness	16 - 17
# Mild Thinness	17 - 18.5
# Normal	18.5 - 25
# Overweight	25 - 30
# Obese Class I	30 - 35
# Obese Class II	35 - 40
# Obese Class III	> 40
```
